positionName: Director of Medical Writing and Research
description:
Full time position in Kanata North for one-year term with opportunity for renewal and advancement. Must be available on short notice. Competitive salary based on experience. Comprehensive benefits package.
Responsibilities
Thera-Business is seeking an experienced medical writer/researcher responsible for leading individual projects. Key responsibilities include the design and development of product value dossiers, value messages, clinical summaries, peer-reviewed manuscripts, systematic reviews, regulatory documents, and reports for pharmaceutical and biotechnology products, medical devices, and public health initiatives. Specific tasks may include the following:

 Conduct structured and/or systematic reviews of clinical literature
 Conduct meta-analyses and network meta-analyses
 Provide expert analysis, interpretation, and summarizing of clinical study results, and appraise studies for study suitability and data contribution


 Synthesize, interpret, and communicate clinical data, including disease-specific data, medical device or pharmaceutical product data, or public health data
 Oversee and mentor medical writers and researchers
 Communicate with clients to ensure understanding of project strategy and the nature of medical writing services required to deliver on project objectives
 Develop outlines
 Develop strategic content
 Conduct revisions
 Perform proofreading and quality assurance tasks

Requirements

 An advanced degree in life sciences (e.g., pharmacology) or a related field (e.g., biology)
 Experience (5+ years) authoring reports for pharmaceutical or biotechnology products, medical devices, or public health initiatives
 A love of science combined with strong writing skills and an interest in their intersection with health care

Critical Skills:

 Leadership and management skills
 Demonstrated writing skills
 Strong multi-tasking and organizational abilities
 Sense of urgency to meet goals, objectives, and deadlines
 Strong attention to detail
 Excellent interpersonal, verbal, and written communications skills
 Demonstrated initiative and accountability
 Experience with literature reviews, systematic reviews, critical appraisals, and/or health technology assessments
